bug.description:
train_data = ddict(lambda: {'rels': ddict(list)}) is ddict the python package: <denchmark-link:https://pypi.org/project/ddict/>https://pypi.org/project/ddict/</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi, It is default dictionary from collections. See helper.py for more info.
Hi, It is default dictionary from collections. See helper.py for more info.
